ignoreCase - whether ignore the case
strList - String List
返回：

if source is null return false

split

public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String source)
String str = "abc\\#def#ghj #kkk # lll #3456\\##\\#\\#\\##09"; String[] strs = split(str); result: abc#def ghj kkk lll 3456# ### 09

Split input string to a string array, use split char flag '#' and ignore blank

参数：
source - the source string to split
返回：

split

public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String source,
                                       char splitChar,
                                       boolean ignoreBlank)
String str = "abc\\#def#ghj #kkk # lll #3456\\##\\#\\#\\##09"; String[] strs = split(str,'#',true); result: abc#def ghj kkk lll 3456# ### 09

Split input string to a string array

参数：
source - the source string to split
splitChar - split char flag
ignoreBlank - weather use trim for each element
返回：
